author: djrtwo
content:
> Speaking about k-finality rule in modified casper FFG of Phase 0, is it related to prevent "bounce attack"? or just for network latency?

The k-finality rule allows for finality in more scenarios under conditions in which latency might be high and have delayed inclusion of attestations from their immediate epoch in which they were created. So "just for network latency". Shouldn't have anything to do with the bounce attack
